body.p: Permit me to solicit your attention to the application of Watkins Johnson and William Hurst heretofore sent you asking your interposition before Judgement to remit a forfeited Bond of Three Hundred Dollars as Bail for Marshall Johnson which I had thought you had the power to do before Judgement in which opinion you differed Since which at the last September term of our Fleming Circuit Court Judgement was rendered for the penalty of 300$ and replevied ThI desire now your interposition in their behalf and that you will remit the same as far as is in your power The papers are all in your posession

With my candid opinion as heretofore expressed the case is one that justly
merits your clemency I am as ever very truly your Friend

To His Excellency
B. Magoffin
Frankfort Ky
Please let me hear from you at your earliest convenience

Fleming Cir. Ct
$300 } Recog.
W. Johnson
Wm Hurst
Issd Octo. 26. 1861
